Name: luy-mohammadramadha
Author: Mohammad Ramadhan Sebwa, Ramadhan Hajj Ndeka, Ismail Were, Musa Murasi Salim Kukuya, Yusuf Shiundu Malala, Yahya Wafula Ojwang, Haroon Albert Msah

Translations.Text: Ne nibenga bakhwasishia imbeli wabu, abali nende amaani okhushila bano! mana nibayiya khushialo muno. koo banyolakhwo abelushila
Toto mu yako khulimwo nende eshitsulisio khu ulia uli nomwoyo nohomba owareka eshirwi naye alolanga
Ne toto khwaloonga likulu nende eshialo nende biosi bilimwo khutsinyanga tsisasaba, ne shikhwanyoola obuchonyi bwosibwosi tawe
Wisumilisie khukababoolanga ne witsomie elira lia Nyasaye wuwo Omulesi eliuba nilishili okhurula nende nilishili okhukwa
Ne omwitsomiekhwo khandi eshilo nende niwakhamala okhumwinamila (okhusujuda)
Ne rechelesia inyanga yomulaanji alilanjilia ahambi
Inyangayabaliwulilaoluyokalwomulango kwa toto, eyo niyo inyanga yokhulamusibwa
Toto efwe nefwe balamusinjia nende bafwisinjia, ne ewefu namulikalukha
Inyanga yeshialo shiliatikha lwangu lwangu, okhukhungâ€™asibwa okho khuliba okhwangu khifwe
Efwe khumanyile muno kababoolanga, ne ewe shobarukanga na amani tawe. Ne wikhoonyele Ikuran okhwitsulisia balia abaria inyanga yeyindukho
